summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 4, Block 4, Brooklyn Addition, and Lots 25 and 26, Block 6, Hillman City Division No. 1 Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-271 and 17-219, respectively.
